page.title: 01 GAZETTEER
page.content: The survey area consists of S.KENT and N.EAST SUSSEX.The land to the West is owned by the Abergavenny family, most being let to tenant farmers.A high percentage of the land is forested (40%), coppiced and managed.Revival of coppicing due to current vogue for open fires and wood burning stoves. Eridge park is the family seat of the Abergavenny family. The A267 Tunbridge Wells_Eastboune road runs N_S across the survey area is much used by heavy traffic. Employment:many people in the area commute to London. Education:area served by state and private schools. Transport:poor rural bus services, better in Tunbridge Wells. July 1985 closure of local railway has affected survey area's commuters.
